name: Lean PRD Template
description: Minimalist PRD focused on problem, solution, and key metrics

problem.title: Problem Statement
prompts: What specific problem are we solving?
Who experiences this problem?
What is the impact of not solving it?
How do users currently work around this?

solution.title: Proposed Solution
prompts: What is our proposed solution?
How does it solve the problem?
What are the key features?
What makes this better than alternatives?

metrics.title: Success Metrics
prompts: How will we measure success?
What are the target KPIs?
What is the definition of done?
How will we track adoption?

mvp.title: MVP Scope
prompts: What is the minimum viable product?
What features are must-have vs nice-to-have?
What can we ship in 4-6 weeks?
What will we explicitly NOT do?

risks.title: Risks & Assumptions
prompts: What are the key risks?
What assumptions are we making?
What dependencies exist?
What could cause this to fail?
